# updateTimeZone(_:completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Updates the trigger’s time zone.

## Declaration

```swift
func updateTimeZone(_ timeZone: TimeZone?, completionHandler completion: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func updateTimeZone(_ timeZone: TimeZone?) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **timeZone**: The new time zone; may be `nil`.
- **completion**: The block executed after the request is processed.



## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMTimerTrigger/timeZone] for a description of how the time zone is interpreted.

- **timeZone**: The timezone in which to evaluate the fire time.
